mapper.insert: insert into contact_record( contact_id, user_id, contact_time, record, last_contact_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time ) values( #{contactId}, #{user.id}, SYSDATE(), #{record}, #{lastContactRecordVO.id}, 0, SYSDATE(), 0, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: select user.id as userid, user.*,contact_record.id as contactid ,contact_record.* from user ,contact_record where user.id = contact_record.user_id and (contact_record.id=#{firstContactId} || contact_record.contact_id=#{firstContactId})
mapper.update: update contact_record set last_contact_id = #{lastContactId} where id=#{firstContactId}
mapper.select: select AUTO_INCREMENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME='contact_record'
